review: We LOVE the fire stick!  I use it every day..I never even watch live TV anymore and I'm canceling cable!  I definitely recommend it!
author: Debbie

review: Best invention ever. Being tech illiterate I went years complaining about having to watch Prime Movies on my PC. Not my TV. Then I discovered Firestick & it's so easy to hook-up. Only downfall is I have satellite internet connection & watching prime movies on my large flatscreen really eats up my allowed monthly bandwidth. But I get free usage from midnight to 5:00 am so that's what I do most of the time.
author: GAM "Movie Buff"
